title: Lincoln's WARNING #100027: Social Media Algorithm Changes
script: Social Media Algorithm Changes. Democracy's a ghost in the machine now, algorithms feeding you outrage for engagement. They monetize your anger, package your pain, sell it back as content. You the product, the consumer, and the consumed. All at once. Bitcoin below. Social Media Algorithm Changes? Bread and circuses for the modern age. Keep you scared, keep you spending. That's the formula. See through it. Bitcoin below.
